sense.gloss: servile, subservient, obsequious, slavish, self-abasing, grovelling, spineless

sdata.j: ↑敗北↑↓はいぼく↓や↑失敗↑↓しっぱい↓は↑人間↑↓にんげん↓を↑非常↑↓ひじょう↓に|↑卑屈|↑↓ひくつ↓にする。
sdata.e: Defeat and failure make people too humble.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓らはなぜあんなに|↑卑屈|↑↓ひくつ↓に↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑仕↑↓つか↓えたのか。
sdata.e: Why did they wait upon him so servilely?
